entities.name: GHOSTS
entities.description: Ghosts are supernatural beings or spirits of the dead that are believed to exist and interact with the living in various cultures and personal experiences

entities.name: CULTURAL, PSYCHOLOGICAL, AND PERSONAL EXPERIENCES
entities.description: These factors are the main influences on why people believe in ghosts, shaping perceptions and beliefs through stories, personal encounters, and psychological needs

entities.name: GHOST STORIES AND LEGENDS
entities.description: Ghost stories and legends are narratives passed down through generations, contributing to the belief in ghosts by creating a sense of familiarity and believability

entities.name: POPULAR CULTURE
entities.description: Movies, TV shows, and books that portray ghosts reinforce the idea that ghosts are real, influencing public perception and belief

entities.name: MYSTERIOUS OCCURRENCES
entities.description: Unexplained events or phenomena that some individuals attribute to the supernatural, leading to a belief in ghosts as a way to make sense of the world

entities.name: PERSONAL ENCOUNTERS
entities.description: Individuals' personal experiences with what they perceive as ghosts, such as seeing apparitions or hearing unexplained noises, which can be intensely real and impactful

entities.name: PSYCHOLOGICAL FACTORS
entities.description: The fear of the unknown, the desire for immortality, and the need for a connection with the spiritual realm are psychological factors that contribute to the belief in ghosts

entities.name: CULTURAL AND RELIGIOUS BELIEFS
entities.description: Beliefs in spirits, ancestors, and supernatural entities that are deeply ingrained in various cultures and religious teachings, influencing perceptions of the supernatural

entities.name: CULTURE
entities.description: Cultural contexts and traditions that influence beliefs in ghosts, often through stories and legends

entities.name: PSYCHOLOGICAL NEEDS
entities.description: Psychological needs such as the fear of the unknown, the desire for immortality, and the need for a connection with the spiritual realm

entities.name: PERSONAL EXPERIENCES
entities.description: Individual experiences that contribute to the belief in ghosts, such as encounters with apparitions or unexplained phenomena

entities.name: TRADITIONS
entities.description: Cultural traditions that include beliefs in spirits or ancestors watching over the living

entities.name: RELIGIOUS TEACHINGS
entities.description: Religious beliefs and teachings about the existence of spirits, angels, and demons

entities.name: SKEPTICS
entities.description: Individuals who dismiss ghostly encounters as mere illusions or superstitions

entities.name: BELIEVERS
entities.description: Individuals who find meaning, comfort, and connection in their beliefs in ghosts
